attributes.action: Add a public vote amendment to the EU Withdrawal Agreement Meaningful Vote.
attributes.additional_details:
People voted for Brexit because they wanted change - but not for the worse.
Strong evidence that Brexit will have a negative impact on our NHS & jobs.
The Final Say campaign currently has support from over 1 million people.
The People's Vote March saw ~700,000 ordinary people take to their feet to call for an opportunity to check that Brexit is still the will of enough of The People before we break our good deal.
We need a chance to look before we Leave or we may never be a United Kingdom again.
attributes.background:
The Government have framed the 2016 referendum result as "The Will Of The People", despite only 38% of eligible voters choosing to Leave.
Far more is now known about the impact of the UK leaving the EU for everyone concerned.
Parliament should give The People a final say with the option to Remain.
